items.sentence: He consoled himself with the thought that it might have been worse.
Tom hopes Mary knows she shouldn't do what John has told her to do.
Tom hopes Mary knows she has do everything John has told her to do.
If you're going to point out Tom's mistakes, at least do it subtly.
If you want the work to be done well, you need to do it yourselves.
I'm sorry. I didn't mean to embarrass you in front of your friends.
In our culture, you can't be married to two women at the same time.
You're out of your mind if you think that's really going to happen.
Tom listens to the radio every morning while he's eating breakfast.
Why don't you tell us what made you think that was going to happen?
